src:
Drei Klubs an Pepê dran
01 Nov 2019, 18:46 by Matthias Rudolph
Der 22-jährige Pepê von Grêmio Porto Alegre ist in Europa heiß begehrt. Wie ‚Globoesporte‘ berichtet, zeigen Paris St. Germain, der FC Porto und die AS Rom Interesse am Flügelstürmer.
Alle drei Klubs seien bereit, zehn Millionen Euro Ablöse für Pepê zu bezahlen. Konkrete Angebote seien in Porto Alegre allerdings noch nicht eingegangen. In 24 Ligaspielen traf der Brasilianer in der laufenden Saison sechs Mal.
text:
Three clubs at Pepê Dran
01 Nov 2019, 18:46 by Matthias Rudolph
The 22-year-old Pepê of Grêmio Porto Alegre is in great demand in Europe. As reported by 'Globoesporte', Paris St. Germain, FC Porto and AS Roma are showing interest in the winger.
All three clubs are willing to pay ten million euros transfer fee for Pepê. Concrete offers have not yet been received in Porto Alegre. In 24 league games, the Brazilian met six times in the current season.
